ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleToc.chapterList:
-@js:
aList=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select('#chapter-list1 a')
list=[]
for(i in aList){list[i]={"title":String(aList[i].text()),"curl":aList[i].attr('href')}}
id=baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]
url="http://m.mhxqiu3.com/bookchapter/"
body="id="+id+"&id2=1"
option={"method":"POST","body":String(body)}
data=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))
for(i in data){list.push({"title":data[i].chaptername,"curl":"/"+String(id)+"/"+data[i].chapterid+".html"})}
list

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

</js>
